ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: the gift of sow
ygData.msgSnippet: I hear ya about the kids in LoIO. Sometimes I swear it s all 12 yr olds or something in there. I was there and a couple people started namecalling. Then other
ygData.messageBody:
I hear ya about the kids in LoIO. Sometimes I swear it's all 12 yr olds or
something in there. I was there and a couple people started namecalling.
Then other people got in on it. Then the person who instigated it started
telling people to shut up that he/she didn't care. and I was thinking, if he
didn't care why is he bothering to respond? It was just really silly. It
lasted a good half hour.
Do you want a last name that doesn't give away your class?
luv,
-Su

> I was checking the list and thought i'd add my two cents to this
> subject line :)
>
> I play a shaman, i just hit level 18 two nights ago (^_^). Ive paid
> for a tp myself, sometimes more than usual to get out of a place i
> just cant stand (like yesterday.. i was hunting in Lake of Ill Omen
> and someone was doing a raid for their monk epic, and everyone was
> shouting and /oocing and even /auctioning and when i asked them to
> tone it down to one channel because not everyone in the zone was on
> the raid, i was rudely told to shut up and the less i whined the
> faster they would be done) or if im despreate and someone's switched
> characters just to port me somewhere. On the SoW part of the idea, i
> think that taking a donation for a sow is all right, like when you're
> in the middle of a fight and someone comes up asking for one, or if
> your in a group and really low on mana and someone comes up and wants
> one, or when all you hear is "can i have sow?" <cast spell> "ooh!
> shes casting sow!!" <the whole durn zone comes running over> "can i
> have sow?" I finally put my character on Roleplay mode (full anon is
> not allowed by my guild) so people wouldnt ask me as often.
> Occasionally i have the random "you are being inspected" and then i
> get asked for it (my weapon is shm only so its kind of a giveaway if
> you know my wep), and ill always cast it for corpse runs for people.
>
> A slightly different subject now... Can anyone suggest a good surname
> for my shammie? Her name's Lorecie, at the rate im going i'll be 20
> by the end of the month and i want a surname hehehe. Also am looking
> for suggestions for my fiancee (both in game and real life) for his
> characer... so i'll be taking his surname on soon.
>
> Thanks for any suggestions and my random ranting about the jerks in
> LoIO.
>
> Lorecie <Vivix Protectorate>
> 18th shaman
> Erolissi Marr
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., Jeff Gaudry <bgrifter@y...> wrote:
> > >to me. Sure, I sometimes get stiffed and sometimes
> > >get something I can't use as a tip, but for the most
> > >part I think I have been well rewarded. For me
> > >it is in character and adds to the game.
> >
> > I think i'm coming to the conclusion that a Druid
> > should less demand payment for a TP, than players
> > should feel that the right thing to do is to donate
> > what they can for one. :) As someone who's taken quite
> > a few, I always make sure I have the standard 10pp
> > available to offer, it's just the right thing to do
> > for the investment of time being given for the other
> > player. I don't think i'd stand there once my druid
> > can group TP and demand payment, but watching that
> > twinked level 12 with better equipment than I have go
> > on about how broke he is might be a little hard to
> > swallow.
> >
> >
> >
